wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Timothy Paul Evans,  (born 21 September 1962) is a retired British Army officer, who served as Commandant of the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst from 2012 to 2013 and then commander of the Allied Rapid Reaction Corps from 2013 to 2016.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Evans
response: ***Timothy Evans (1924–1950), Welshman hanged for murders he did not commit
